Uses of Class
nl.inl.blacklab.search.Hits

  • Packages that use Hits 
    Package Description
    nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument
    Classes for dealing with per-document resultsets (instead of per-hits resultsets, which BlackLab mostly deals with)
    nl.inl.blacklab.search
    Contains the main BlackLab classes.
    nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping
    Classes for grouping hits.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hits DocResult.getHits()
      Deprecated. 
      inefficient when making concordances. Use getNumberOfHits() or getHits(int max) to retrieve some or all of the hits as needed

      Get some or all hits in this document.
